description: An MTLS Auth source can be used to issue tokens based on user certificates.

CA.description: The Certificate authority to use to validate user certificates in PEM format.
CA.title: CA

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

claimsRetrievalMode.description: Defines if and how you want to enable auto login with client certificates.
claimsRetrievalMode.title: claimsRetrievalMode

entraApplicationCredentials.description: Additional information required when claims retrieval mode is set to Entra.
entraApplicationCredentials.title: entraApplicationCredentials

fingerprints.description: The fingerprint of the CAs in the chain.
fingerprints.title: fingerprints

ignoredKeys.description: A list of claims that will be filtered out from the identity token. A claim will be ignored if it is prefixed with one of the items in the ignoredKeys list. This runs before includedKeys computation.
ignoredKeys.title: ignoredKeys

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

includedKeys.description: A list of claims that defines which claims will be added to the identity token. A claim will be included if it is prefixed with one of the items in the includedKeys list. This runs after ignoreddKeys computation.
includedKeys.title: includedKeys

modifier.description: Contains optional information about a remote service that can be used to modify the claims that are about to be delivered using this authentication source.
modifier.title: modifier

oktaApplicationCredentials.description: Additional information required when claims retrieval mode is set to Okta.
oktaApplicationCredentials.title: oktaApplicationCredentials

principalUserX509Field.description: The X.509 field to look for to extract the user principal name.
principalUserX509Field.title: principalUserX509Field

subjectKeyIDs.description: Value of the CAs X.509 SubjectKeyIDs in the chain.
subjectKeyIDs.title: subjectKeyIDs

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: MTLSSource
